info.title: Rotten Tomatoes
info.description: Test our API services using I/O Docs.

externalDocs.description: You can also view our written documentation.

parameters.name: page_limit
parameters.description: The amount of new release dvds to show per page

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The selected page of current DVD releases

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Provides localized data for the selected country (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2) if available. Otherwise, returns US data.

parameters.name: limit

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Movie ID. You can use the movies search endpoint or peruse the lists of movies/dvds to get the Movie ID

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Only supports imdb lookup at this time

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The plain text search query to search for a movie. Remember to URI encode this!

parameters.description: The amount of movie search results to show per page

parameters.description: The selected page of movie search results

parameters.name: review_type
parameters.description: 3 different review types are possible: 'all', 'top_critic' and 'dvd'. 'top_critic' shows all the Rotten Tomatoes designated top critics. 'dvd' pulls the reviews given on the DVD of the movie. 'all' as the name implies retrieves all reviews.

parameters.name: page_limit
parameters.description: The number of reviews to show per page

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The selected page of reviews

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Provides localized data for the selected country (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2) if available. Otherwise, returns US data.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Movie ID. You can use the movies search endpoint or peruse the lists of movies/dvds to get the Movie ID

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of similar movies to show
